def binary(a):
    b=""
    for i in range(4):
        b=str(a%2)+b
        a=a/2
    return b   

n=input()
q=list(raw_input())
for i in range(len(q)):
    q[i]=binary(int(q[i],16))
n1=""
n2=""
for i in range(len(q)):
    n1+=q[i][:2]
    n2+=q[i][2:]
qn=[0]*(2*n+1)
rem=0
for i in range(len(n1)):
    k=2*n-i-1
    qn[k+1]=str((int(n1[k])+int(n2[k])+rem)%2)
    rem=(int(n1[k])+int(n2[k])+rem)/2
print "".join(qn[1:])
